title: apply
desc: apply a function to every value in a vector or key in a map

input.name: function
input.description: the operator to be used as the function, $item to be used as the variable taken from the data variable when defining inputs and params (instance of the loop), output not included in this object since output is in the apply object

params.name: mapOrArray
params.description: determines whether the output is an array or a map (input value as key,  response as value)
